attributes.action: Everyone remove there money & funds from RBS for a period of 1 week in protest!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone who has a account or money invested with rbs remove it for 1 week in protest over £1 billion bonus payout.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
